Ah, Portal. I got this game on sale, 90% off. $1. It was quite enjoyable. Great puzzle design, interesting [u]character[/u], semi-decent story, and one of the very, VERY few shooter games that I play. 7/10. Would I say it's worth $10? Probably not. Even so, if you're gonna be playing Portal 2, PLAY THIS FIRST. The 2 storylines are connected. Thank me later. Or don't. Your choice.

Portal is pretty much perfect. There's no real flaws with gameplay, and its story is the right length. 
My only qualm is in my opinion, the last level felt a bit long, but I was in a bit of a hurry when I was finishing it, so that might be the cause of that.
I definitely recommend Portal, its just a great game.

Why havenâ€™t I played this before? I think it might just have become one of my all-time favourite games (along with the Talos Principle). It has [i]the most perfect[/i] blend of atmosphere, puzzles, storyline, story progression, voice acting and black humour. Itâ€™s an absolute gem of a game, albeit a little short - Iâ€™m very slow but it only took me 14 hours to complete on the first run. But no matter, it felt perfectly paced; not [i]too[/i] short.

It just gets better and better and more fun the more you progress. The piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance is the portal mechanics. Once you get the hang of how this works, particularly how to increase your path trajectory, it blows your mind as to the various possibilities for moving around. A bonus for me was that I didnâ€™t need any walkthrough cheats (I usually need one or two in most games). All the puzzles will submit to logic if you can open your mind far enough.   I hope Portal 2 is as good â€“ I bought both in a cheap bundle.  10/10 recommended. Brilliant!
One of the best games in my opinion

[h1]FINAL THOUGHT PS:
And when you're dead I will be
still alive.[/h1]

[h1]â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜†[/h1]
Loved it

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.
I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.

Think of all the things we learned
for the people who are still alive.
Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE.
HAHA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
when there's Science to do.
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE

If by chance you are not familiar with this game in anyway, know that it is often, and rightfully, considered a classic. Now over 10 years old, the game has aged remarkably well. Despite my familiarity with the game, its slogans, and a part of its storyline, I actually had never played it before. I started it, finished it in two sittings, and quickly realized why it has long been so well liked. It is simply an amazing game. If you've gone this long without any spoilers to the game, I won't be the one to give anything away, so I'll keep this vague. You play a character that is inside Aperture Science Laboratories and you progress through increasingly difficult levels and solve the puzzles that each level has. Though this sounds simple, the game has great storyline, amazing voice acting, and a great atmosphere. It is immersive and easy to get caught up in the world. Though not really a scary game, simply due to some moments with stellar atmosphere and/or voice acting, there was more than once that I got genuinely creeped out. The puzzles are perfectly balanced between being accomplishable and being challenging. The ending is perfect and left me pleasantly surprised. Plus, the graphics are great for the gameâ€™s age. Don't be like me: stop procrastinating and waiting for the right time to get this game, just play it!! It is for sure 10/10 and I could not recommend it more.
Gioco carino per passare qualche oretta, il finale piuttosto in aspettato rompe la monotonia dei livelli precedenti!

just... it's the best game of all time

play it already

Portal Ã© um fodendo jogo muito foda!

O se resume em puzzles com uma historia por trÃ¡s, com uma mecanica de portais que vocÃª pode atirar em qualquer parede, chÃ£o ou em qualquer lugar nranco. Os puzzles de inicio sÃ£o bem simples porÃ©m, ao passar do tempo vÃ£o ficando um pouco mais dificeis, mas se vocÃª quiser desafio mesmo, ao terminar o jogo vocÃª libera as fases especiais que sÃ£o os mesmos puzzles sÃ³ que muito mais dificieis.
A historia em geral Ã© boa, tendo uma grande reviravolta que todos nÃ³s sabemos e que virou meme entre a comunidade "O bolo Ã© uma mentira", mas oque acontece se vocÃª nÃ£o ganha o bolo, bom ai vocÃª joga para descobrir!
O jogo Ã© curto, vocÃª zera ele em 3 horas, mas acredite sÃ£o as 3 horas mais divertidas da sua vida, principalmente nas fases finais antes de chegar na Glados, adcionando mais uma mecÃ¢nica muito util no puzzle final.

Portal is a classic of puzzle games.
It is a game of physics-based puzzles and they are all really good. You are thrown into the game to solve puzzle after puzzle and pass to the next level.
I was impressed by how it looks even for today's standards; game mechanics and controls are very smooth.
The game is relatively short but very satisfying, I didn't want it to end. If a game manages that then is 100% recommended. I believe anyone that enjoys video games should play it at least once.
